query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.operatetype=124 and est.linkrejectreason='101091101' and est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and est.operatetype=124 and est.linkrejectreason='101091101' and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
